citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
In the cabinet, there were several medications that expired or labels did not provide an expiration date. The medications
without an expiration date were Ketoconazole, Prednisone and Rimadyl. The medications that expired were AmoxiTabs,
Zymox and Trazadone. Expired medications can lose their effectiveness or become toxic, leading to a delay in proper
diagnosis and treatment. These expired medications and improperly labeled medications should not be used for covered
species such as dogs. All medications at a licensed facility that are being used for covered species must be consistent
with providing adequate veterinary care to prevent, control, diagnose and treat disease and injuries. Correct by December
10, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
n

narrative:
2.40(b) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
In the cabinet, there were several medications that expired or labels did not provide an expiration date. The medications 
without an expiration date were Ketoconazole, Prednisone and Rimadyl. The medications that expired were AmoxiTabs, 
Zymox and Trazadone. Expired medications can lose their effectiveness or become toxic, leading to a delay in proper 
diagnosis and treatment. These expired medications and improperly labeled medications should not be used for covered 
species such as dogs. All medications at a licensed facility that are being used for covered species must be consistent 
with providing adequate veterinary care to prevent, control, diagnose and treat disease and injuries. Correct by December 
10, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner. 
 
 n
